display.value: Notification of Anti-Microbial Device Cycle Data

definition.value: Notification of Anti-Microbial Device Cycle Data
This message type is used to report how the specimen moves through its lifecycle from collection, identification, transport, acceptance or rejection, processing to storage and disposition.
